actions.description: The deinonychus makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw

specialTraits.description: If the deinonychus moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a Claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the deinonychus can make one Bite attack against it as a bonus action.
specialTraits.name: Pounce
